channel.title: Stats and R
channel.description: Recent content on Stats and R

item.title: Contact
item.description: Please use the contact form below: Name: Email: Your message: For mistakes or bugs, please inform me about it here.

item.title: Thanks
item.description: Your form has been successfully submitted ! I will get back to you as soon as possible. Best, Antoine Soetewey Submit another form

item.title: About
item.description: Hello, my name is Antoine Soetewey. I am a PhD student in statistics at UCLouvain (Belgium). My research interests focus on survival analysis and bio-statistical procedures applied to cancer patients. In parallel with my doctoral thesis, I am teaching assistant for several courses in statistics and probability at bachelor and masterâ€™s level. I also provide trainings and workshops in statistics and R in a belgian consulting company. For more information about myself please visit www.

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: This is the first post for the blog Stats and R. This blog aims at helping academics (mainly students) and professionals (working with data) to grasp important concepts in statistics and to apply them in R. Thanks in advance for reading, and do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions or inquiries.
